parameters.subject: AI Aliens Video Pipeline - No Location Found
parameters.html:
No location found with Status = Images_Approved or Videos_Review.

Make sure all images are approved before running the Video Pipeline.

parameters.subject: =AI Aliens Video Pipeline - Nothing to Do
parameters.html:
=Video Pipeline ran for {{ $json.location.Name }} but found nothing to do.

Initial run already complete and no videos marked for Redo.

parameters.command: =convert /mnt/data/tmp/style_image.png -bordercolor white -border 40x40 -gravity south -background white -splice 0x80 -font Helvetica-Bold -pointsize 48 -fill '#2C3E50' -gravity south -annotate +0+30 'Greetings from {{ $('Prepare Postcard').first().json.locationName }}!' /mnt/data/tmp/postcard.png

parameters.subject: =AI Aliens - Music Generation Failed for {{ $json.locationName }}
parameters.html:
=Music generation failed for {{ $json.locationName }}.

Please check the workflow and try again.

parameters.subject: =AI Aliens - Music Generation Timeout for {{ $json.locationName }}
parameters.html:
=Music generation timed out for {{ $json.locationName }}.

Elapsed: {{ Math.round($json.elapsed / 1000) }} seconds

parameters.command: =convert {{ $('Split Slideshow Images').item.json.imageDownloads.outputPath }} -resize 1000x1250 -bordercolor white -border 40x40 -gravity south -background white -splice 0x285 -font Humor-Sans -pointsize 48 -fill black -gravity south -annotate +0+140 '{{ $('Split Slideshow Images').item.json.imageDownloads.caption }}' {{ $('Split Slideshow Images').item.json.imageDownloads.polaroidPath }}

parameters.subject: =Gorb & Pleck Batch - Clip 1 Timeout
parameters.html:
=Clip 1 generation timed out.

Content: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.contentType }}
Filename: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.filename }}
Task ID: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.clip1TaskId }}

parameters.subject: =Gorb & Pleck Batch - Clip 1 Failed
parameters.html:
=Clip 1 generation failed.

Content: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.contentType }}
Filename: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.filename }}
Task ID: {{ $('Set Clip 1 Start Time').item.json.clip1TaskId }}
Error: {{ $('Check Clip 1 Status').item.json.data.errorMessage }}

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.first().json;

return data.items.map(item => ({ json: item }));

parameters.subject: =Gorb & Pleck Batch - Clip 2 Failed
parameters.html:
=Clip 2 generation failed.

Content: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.contentType }}
Filename: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.filename }}
Task ID: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.clip2TaskId }}

parameters.subject: =Gorb & Pleck Batch - Clip 2 Timeout
parameters.html:
=Clip 2 generation timed out.

Content: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.contentType }}
Filename: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.filename }}
Task ID: {{ $('Set Clip 2 Start Time').item.json.clip2TaskId }}

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.first().json;

return data.items.map(item => ({ json: item }));

parameters.subject: =AI Aliens - Videos Complete: {{ $('Prepare Video Generation').first().json.locationName }}
parameters.html:
=Video generation complete for {{ $('Prepare Video Generation').first().json.locationName }}.

4 videos uploaded and ready for review.

json.videoPrompt1:
Two alien tourists at Dirigible dock with brass mooring posts and steam-powered cargo cranes, porters wheeling trunks across riveted iron platforms, arriving passengers stepping off gangplanks. GORB: a grey alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive blue eyes, wearing a black t-shirt with "I love humans" text and a red heart, khaki cargo shorts, white crew socks, and worn grey sneakers. Voice: Male high-pitched, eager, slightly nasally, speaks with childlike enthusiasm. PLECK: a grey-green alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive amber-orange eyes, wearing a dark tropical Hawaiian shirt with pink and green floral pattern, dark grey jeans, and black Converse-style sneakers. Silent this clip. Warm golden light catching brass fixtures and copper pipes, sharp shadows cutting across narrow lanes. Wide aerial view overlooking the city rooftops.

Gorb taking a deep breath of the air, Pleck looking skeptical Gorb says: "I can't believe we made it to Coppervale! Look at this place!" Pleck stands beside, observing silently.

Audio: Hissing steam valves, spinning gears, vendor calls, crowd chatter, distant clock tower chimes, clanking machinery. No subtitles. Buddy-comedy vibe.
json.videoPrompt2:
Two alien tourists at Dirigible dock with brass mooring posts and steam-powered cargo cranes, porters wheeling trunks across riveted iron platforms, arriving passengers stepping off gangplanks. GORB: a grey alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive blue eyes, wearing a black t-shirt with "I love humans" text and a red heart, khaki cargo shorts, white crew socks, and worn grey sneakers. Voice: Male high-pitched, eager, slightly nasally, speaks with childlike enthusiasm. PLECK: a grey-green alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive amber-orange eyes, wearing a dark tropical Hawaiian shirt with pink and green floral pattern, dark grey jeans, and black Converse-style sneakers. Voice: Male low, dry, deadpan delivery, slight exasperation. Warm golden light catching brass fixtures and copper pipes, sharp shadows cutting across narrow lanes. Wide aerial view overlooking the city rooftops.

Pleck says: "It's too high." Gorb looks concerned, then reassuring and says: "Don't look down! Let's explore!" Pleck sighs, reluctantly follows.

Audio: Hissing steam valves, spinning gears, vendor calls, crowd chatter, distant clock tower chimes, clanking machinery. No subtitles. Buddy-comedy vibe.

json.videoPrompt1:
Two alien tourists at Covered market hall with an arched iron framework and dirty glass roof, crowded stalls selling mechanical parts, fabric bolts, and exotic curios. GORB: a grey alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive blue eyes, wearing a black t-shirt with "I love humans" text and a red heart, khaki cargo shorts, white crew socks, and worn grey sneakers. Voice: Male high-pitched, eager, slightly nasally, speaks with childlike enthusiasm. PLECK: a grey-green alien with a large bulbous head, big expressive amber-orange eyes, wearing a dark tropical Hawaiian shirt with pink and green floral pattern, dark grey jeans, and black Converse-style sneakers. Silent this clip. Warm golden light catching brass fixtures and copper pipes, sharp shadows cutting across narrow lanes. Wide aerial view overlooking the city rooftops.

Gorb looks at camera enthusiastically and says: "Coppervale was amazing! The views, the food, everything! Five out of five probes!" Pleck stands beside with arms crossed, rolling eyes.

Audio: Hissing steam valves, spinning gears, vendor calls, crowd chatter, distant clock tower chimes, clanking machinery. No subtitles. Buddy-comedy vibe.

Pleck looks at camera with deadpan expression and says: "It's still too high. One probe." Gorb stands beside, looking disappointed at Pleck's review.

json.Title: Postcards from Coppervale
json.Caption: Collecting memories (and Pleck's sighs) across the universe. #SpaceTourists #GorbAndPleck #TravelLife

json.Title: Pleck almost smiled (proof inside)
json.Caption: Just two aliens doing tourist things in Coppervale. Pleck only complained 47 times. #AlienTourists #GorbAndPleck #TravelGram

location.Name: Coppervale
location.Description: A Victorian steampunk city with cramped half-timbered buildings, exposed copper pipes and fittings accenting the architecture, cobblestone streets, ornate wrought-iron gas lamp posts, airships drifting overhead, and one giant clock tower rising above the city.
location.Color_Palette: Warm sepia and brass gold, deep mahogany brown, aged copper green, cream stone, black wrought iron
location.Camera_Angle: Wide aerial view overlooking the city rooftops
location.Sky_Day: Amber-tinted sky with a pale sun, scattered dirigibles drifting between distant clock towers
location.Sky_Night: Deep indigo sky with a bright copper-colored moon and faint stars
location.Lighting_Day: Warm golden light catching brass fixtures and copper pipes, sharp shadows cutting across narrow lanes
location.Lighting_Night: Warm amber pools from gas lamps, brass and copper surfaces glowing softly, deep shadows between lamp posts
location.Ambient_Day: Hissing steam valves, spinning gears, vendor calls, crowd chatter, distant clock tower chimes, clanking machinery
location.Ambient_Night: Distant rhythmic machinery, occasional steam releases, muffled footsteps on cobblestone, clock tower chimes echoing
location.Music: Victorian orchestral with strings and brass, interwoven with rhythmic clockwork percussion and subtle steam hisses

contentRows.Title: Welcome to Coppervale!
contentRows.Caption: Ready to explore the steampunk wonder that is Coppervale? Gears, gadgets, and great food await! #Coppervale #SteampunkVibes #TravelAdventure
